name: Classic Snake
summary:
The classic game of Snake - eat the targets & grow, but don't run into anything !

A great way to relax and tune-out from your day for a quick break. 

Boards - Classic board where snake wraps-around, Walls, Broken Wall, Spiral, and more

Speeds - From very Slow to nearly impossibly Fast 

Backgrounds - Star field scrolling, white, black, wooden, and more

Music - 8-Bit retro soundtrack

Controls - Directional or "Steering" controls (choose from Settings)

Full Screen support

Share a screenshot of your finished game on Facebook or Twitter !

Handy keyboard shortcuts:
P; Play 
B: Change background
K: Change sKin (how the snake looks)
M: Menu
X: Toggle Sound
Spacebar : Pause

Cursor keys to move snake (WASD keys can also be used)

Pick number of targets in the game: ONE or 5 or even 10 ! (choose from settings)

High scores are saved for each speed and board

Multiple speeds - Many boards - Full Screen support - Easy controls - 
Lovely graphics - Smooth play.......classic snake is the snake game for everyone.
